00045 CSearchDialogResult::CSearchDialogResult(QWidget *parent, const char *name) : QWidget(parent, name) {   
00046     
00047     QHBoxLayout* l = new QHBoxLayout(this);
00048     m_splitter = new QSplitter(Qt::Vertical, this, "result splitter");  
00049     l->addWidget(m_splitter);
00050     
00051     QWidget* d = new QWidget(m_splitter);
00052     QHBoxLayout* main_layout = new QHBoxLayout(d);  
00053     QLabel *label1 = new QLabel(d, "label1");
00054     label1->setText( i18n( "Modules:" ) );
00055     label1->setAutoResize(true);
00056     QLabel* label2 = new QLabel(d, "label2");
00057     label2->setText( i18n("Entries found:") );
00058     label2->setAutoResize(true);
00059 
00060     resultModuleTree = new CSearchDialogResultModuleView(d, "resultModuleTree");
00061     resultTree = new CSearchDialogResultView( d, "resultTree");
00062 
00063   m_displayWidget = new KHTMLPart(m_splitter);
00064 
00065     connect(resultModuleTree, SIGNAL(moduleSelected(CSwordModuleInfo*)), resultTree, SLOT(setModule(CSwordModuleInfo*)));
00066     connect(resultTree, SIGNAL(newPreviewText(const QString)), this, SLOT(updatePreview(const QString)));
00067 
00068     QVBoxLayout* layout_1 = new QVBoxLayout();
00069     QVBoxLayout* layout_2 = new QVBoxLayout();  
00070         
00071     layout_1->addWidget(label1);
00072     layout_1->addWidget(resultModuleTree);
00073     
00074     layout_2->addWidget(label2);
00075     layout_2->addWidget(resultTree, 5);
00076     
00077     main_layout->addLayout(layout_1);
00078     main_layout->addSpacing(2);
00079     main_layout->addLayout(layout_2);
00080 }
00081 
00082 void CSearchDialogResult::setModuleList(ListCSwordModuleInfo&   modules) {
00083     moduleList = modules;
00084     
00085     resultModuleTree->setModuleList(moduleList);
00086     resultModuleTree->clear();
00087     resultModuleTree->setupTree();  
00088     
00089     resultTree->clear();
00090 }

00094 void CSearchDialogResult::updatePreview(const QString newText) {
00095     qDebug("CSearchDialogResult::updatePreview(const QString newText) ");
00096     QString text = newText;
00097     //find text page
00098     QString searchedText;
00099     CSearchDialogText* textPart = 0;
00100     for (QObject* w = parent(); w; w = w->parent()) {
00101         if (w->isA("CSearchDialog")) {
00102             CSearchDialog*  dlg = dynamic_cast<CSearchDialog*>(w);
00103             searchedText = dlg->getSearchedText().stripWhiteSpace();
00104             textPart = dlg->m_searchText;
00105             break;
00106         }       
00107     }
00108     
00109     const QString part1( "<font color=\"red\"><b>");
00110     const QString part2("</b></font>");
00111     const int insertLength(part1.length()+part2.length());
00112 
00113     int searchType(textPart->getSearchType());
00114   if (searchType & CSwordModuleSearch::exactPhrase) {
00115         for (int pos = 0 ; pos != -1;){
00116             pos = text.find(searchedText,pos,textPart->isCaseSensitive());
00117             if (pos!=-1 && !CToolClass::inHTMLTag(pos, text)) { //something was found
00118                 text.insert(pos + searchedText.length(),part2);         
00119                 text.insert(pos, part1);
00120                 pos += searchedText.length() + insertLength;
00121             }
00122         }
00123     }
00124     else if (searchType & CSwordModuleSearch::multipleWords) {
00125         QStringList searchedWords;      
00126         int wordIndex = 0;
00127         QString word = QString::null;
00128         while (!(word = KStringHandler::word(searchedText, wordIndex)).isEmpty()) {
00129             searchedWords.append(word);
00130             ++wordIndex;
00131         }
00132 
00133         QString currentWord;
00134         for (unsigned int i=0; i < searchedWords.count(); i++) {
00135             currentWord = searchedWords[i];
00136             int count = text.contains(currentWord, textPart->isCaseSensitive());    
00137             int pos = 0;            
00138             int i2 = 0;
00139             while (i2 < count) {
00140                 pos = text.find(currentWord,pos?pos+1:0, textPart->isCaseSensitive());
00141                 if (pos!=-1 && !CToolClass::inHTMLTag(pos, text)) { //something was found
00142 
00143                     text.insert(pos + currentWord.length(), part2);
00144                     text.insert(pos, part1);
00145                         
00146                     pos += currentWord.length() + insertLength;
00147                 }
00148                 ++i2;
00149             }
00150         }
00151     }
00152     else if (searchType & CSwordModuleSearch::regExp) {
00153         QRegExp regExp(searchedText);
00154         regExp.setCaseSensitive( textPart->isCaseSensitive() );
00155         int matchLength = 0;
00156         for (int pos = 0; pos != -1;){
00157             pos = regExp.search(text, pos);
00158             matchLength = regExp.matchedLength();
00159             if (pos!=-1 && matchLength > 0 && !CToolClass::inHTMLTag(pos, text)) {
00160                     text.insert(pos + matchLength, part2);
00161                     text.insert(pos, part1);
00162                     pos += matchLength + insertLength;
00163             }
00164         }           
00165     }
00166 
00167     //module is Unicode-based
00168 //  if (resultModuleTree->getCurrentModule()->isUnicode() ) {
00169 //      const QFont f = CBTConfig::get( CBTConfig::unicode);
00170 //      text = QString::fromLatin1("<P dir=\"%1\"><FONT FACE=\"%2\" SIZE=\"%3\">%4</FONT></P>")
00171 //      .arg(resultModuleTree->getCurrentModule()->textDirection() == CSwordModuleInfo::RightToLeft ? "rtol" : "ltor")
00172 //      .arg(f.family())
00173 //      .arg(CToolClass::makeLogicFontSize(f.pointSize()))
00174 //      .arg(text);
00175 //  }
00176     
00177     m_displayWidget->begin();   
00178     m_displayWidget->write(text
00179 //      QString::fromLatin1("<HTML><HEAD></HEAD><BODY><DIV><FONT color=\"red\">%1</font> <SMALL>(%2)</SMALL></DIV><BR>%3</BODY></HTML>")
00180 //       .arg(resultTree->currentText())
00181 //       .arg((resultModuleTree->getCurrentModule()) ? resultModuleTree->getCurrentModule()->config(CSwordModuleInfo::Description) : QString::fromLatin1("<I>%1</I>").arg(i18n("module not set")) )
00182 //       .arg(text)
00183     );
00184     m_displayWidget->end();
00185 }
00186 
00187 void CSearchDialogResult::clearResult() {
00188     resultTree->clear();
00189     resultModuleTree->clear();
00190     
00191     m_displayWidget->begin();
00192     m_displayWidget->write("<HTML><HEAD></HEAD><BODY></BODY></HTML>");
00193     m_displayWidget->end();
00194 }
